DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/pr.description: Delete a configured Zero Trust Gateway proxy endpoint.

success.description: Indicate whether the API call was successful.

200.description: Returns a deleted proxy endpoint response.

success.description: Indicate whether the API call was successful.
Indicate whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: Returns a deleted proxy endpoint response failure.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/proxy.description: List all Zero Trust Gateway proxy endpoints for an account.

success.description: Indicate whether the API call was successful.

ips.description: Specify the list of CIDRs to restrict ingress connections.

items.description: Specify an IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR. Limit IPv6 to a maximum of /109 and IPv4 to a maximum of /25.

name.description: Specify the name of the proxy endpoint.

subdomain.description: Specify the subdomain to use as the destination in the proxy client.

200.description: Returns a list of proxy endpoints response.
